Class ZeroLeader

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.common.EventDispatcher
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.leadercards.LeaderCard
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.leadercards.ZeroLeader
public class ZeroLeader extends LeaderCard
Leader card with the ability to transform white marbles into a resource when taken from the market.

  • Constructor Details

    • ZeroLeader

      public ZeroLeader​(ResourceType resource, CardRequirement requirement, int victoryPoints, int id)
      Class constructor.
      Parameters:
      resource - the resource bound to the card. The card's ability is restricted to acting on this resource type only.
      requirement - the requirement to be satisfied for card activation
      victoryPoints - the victory points associated with the card
      id - the card identifier number

  • Method Details

    • replaceMarketResources

      public Map<ResourceType,​Integer> replaceMarketResources​(ResourceType replaceableResType, Map<ResourceType,​Integer> toProcess, Map<ResourceType,​Integer> replacements)
      Description copied from class: LeaderCard
      Processes Zero resources. If the leader is a ZeroLeader, they are replaced by the ResourceType of the leader card.
      Overrides:
      replaceMarketResources in class LeaderCard
      Parameters:
      replaceableResType - the type of the resources to be replaced
      toProcess - the resources to be processed
      replacements - the resources to substitute to the replaceable resources. If the leader's resource has a non-zero value, the leader is activated, and the entry relative to the leader's resource (if present) will be removed. This is to ensure proper re-utilization of the current map in cascading calls to the method on multiple leaders. If there's resources of different type from the leader's, they will be ignored.
      Returns:
      the resources transformed as per the leader's ability

      public ReducedLeaderCard reduce()
